string.value: #b#p2111005##k is the little Fairy who studies alchemy. She seems to be in need of help...

#p2111005#'s studies have now taken her ahead of #o5110301# and onto #o5110302#. #p2111005# said in order to thoroughly investigate #r#o5110302##k, she'll need #b#t4000365##k... \n\n#i4000365##t4000365# #b#c4000365##k/160

I gave #p2111005# all the #t4000365#s she asked for. She revealed that she learned alchemy from the Zenumist alchemists, but slowly found Alcadno's work fascinating, and is now conducting studies secret from the alchemists that have taught her.

Hey! You're the one that helped me continue the studies regarding the Roids! So nice to see you! Thanks to your help, I think I can figure out how the Roids work. The thing is, I am currently conducting other research, and I need more items to work with. Can you help me out once more?
Thank you so much! Please go get 50 propellers for the Neo-Huroids. That should be enough to generate power for the heavy Neo-Huroids! Thanks!
Wait, are you busy? Oh...darn! There's nothing I can do then...where am I going to get the propellers?

Hey! You're the one that helped me continue my studies! So nice to see you! Thanks to your help, I think I can figure out how #o5110301# works. The thing is, I am currently conducting.. another type of research, and I need more I items to work with. Can you help me out once more?
Thank you so much! Please go get #b160 #t4000365#s#k from #r#o5110302##k for me! #o5110302# is an upgraded model of #o5110301#, and it always carries around a huge power generator.

If I really study #t4000365#, which is the link between the power source and the body of #o5110302#, then I'll be able to figure out a way to deliver power from the source to the body in an efficient manner.
Wait, are you busy? Sigh... there's nothing I can do then. Now where am I going to get #t4000365# then?
Yeah! It's #t4000365#, #t4000365#! Thank you so much! This should be enough for me to study the way the energy flows within #o5110302#!

Oh and please don't tell anyone that #p2111005# made this request. The thing is, I learned alchemy from Zenumists. Alcadnos are better at creating mechanical dolls, so if they find out, they'll really yell at me. Promise to keep it a secret? Only a few have done this and managed to keep it quiet...
Hmm... you didn't get #b160 #t4000365#s#k yet? I guess even a traveler like you finds it difficult to fight against #r#o5110302##k.
